data.eml:eml: First records of Heterotoma merioptera (Scopoli, 1763) and Aradus serbicus (Horváth, 1888) (Heteroptera: Miridae et Aradidae) from Germany

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morkel, Carsten (2010): First records of Heterotoma merioptera (Scopoli, 1763) and Aradus serbicus (Horváth, 1888) (Heteroptera: Miridae et Aradidae) from Germany. Zootaxa 2651: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198822
